Unfinished Tales of Númenor and Middle-earth

wikitext.*:
'''''Palantir''''' is [[Quenya]] for "far-sighted", and can refer to:

==Middle-earth==
*[[Palantíri]] (singular ''Palantír''), Seeing stones.
*[[Tar-Palantir]], the twenty-fourth [[King of Númenor|King]] of [[Númenor]].

==Chapters==
*"[[The Palantír]]", the eleventh chapter in ''[[The Two Towers]]''.
*"[[The Palantíri]]", the last chapter in ''[[Unfinished Tales of Númenor and Middle-earth]]''.
=Other=
*[[Palantiren]], fantasy anthology.
*[[The Palantír (scene)]], scene in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]].
**[[The Palantir (soundtrack)]], soundtrack in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]].
*''[[Палантир|The Palantír Journal]]'', [[St Petersburg Tolkien Society]]'s annual publication.
